Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitPaymentsInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitPaymentsService
public interface FlipFitPaymentsInterface
Interface for managing payments in the FlipFit system. Provides methods to handle payment transactions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    FlipFitPayments
    makePayment(String customerId, Double amountPaid, String cardNumber, String cvv, YearMonth cardExpiry, LocalDate date)
    Processes a payment and creates a payment record.

  • Method Details

    • makePayment

      FlipFitPayments makePayment(String customerId, Double amountPaid, String cardNumber, String cvv, YearMonth cardExpiry, LocalDate date)
      Processes a payment and creates a payment record.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the unique identifier of the customer making the payment
      amountPaid - the amount of money being paid
      cardNumber - the credit/debit card number used for the payment
      cvv - the CVV code of the card used for the payment
      cardExpiry - the expiry date of the card used for the payment
      date - the date on which the payment is made
      Returns:
      a FlipFitPayments object representing the payment record
